Name: Horse Hair
Description: Shed horse hair can be made into stiff and sturdy fabric.

DescriptionLocalization.es: El pelo de caballo se puede convertir en una tela rígida y resistente.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 말 모피는 뻣뻣하고 튼튼한 천일 수 있습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Pferdehaar kann zu steifem und robustem Material verarbeitet werden.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Le crin peut être transformé en tissu rigide et solide.
DescriptionLocalization.it: I peli di cavallo possono essere trasformati in tessuto rigido e robusto.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 脱毛した馬の毛は、硬くて丈夫な生地にすることができます。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Horse hair can be turned into stiff and resistant fabric.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Horse hair can be turned into a strong and durable fabric.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: At at kılı sert ve katı bir kumaş haline getirilebilir.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 脱落的马毛可以制成坚硬的织物。
